curved_or_warped_walls.description: Left wall and ceiling appear irregularly warped with streaky texture, causing nonplanar geometry in the room perimeter.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges around the window frames and the round tabletop appear slightly misaligned or distorted relative to other architectural cues.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues and perspective between foreground table and background seating feel inconsistent, slightly flattening or exaggerating distances.

ghosting.description: Subtle ghosting along high-contrast edges of curtains and windows.

over_blur.description: Overall surfaces look smeared with soft blur, reducing fine texture fidelity on upholstery and tablecloth.

texture_inconsistency.description: Texture quality varies across surfaces (ceiling vs. furniture) leading to inconsistent material appearance.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows a plausible interior layout with reasonable room-scale cues, but suffers from notable geometric distortions (warped walls, misaligned edges) and depth inconsistencies. Textures are soft with ghosting and inconsistency across surfaces, indicating weaker 3DGS texture fidelity. Overall realism is moderate; it could be mistaken for a reconstruction with artifacts rather than a true photograph.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Some depth cues and edge alignments appear slightly off, particularly around the window frames and table edge, giving a mild sense of perspective distortion.

over_blur.description: Strong overall blur/painterly effect reduces fine texture fidelity and sharpness.

texture_inconsistency.description: Inconsistent surface textures (sofa, table, walls) with irregular brush-like patterns across surfaces.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows a plausible indoor layout with recognizable geometry, but overall realism is compromised by heavy blur and painterly texturing that reduces fine-grained texture fidelity. Minor depth alignment issues exist near the windows and table edge, yet no severe geometric breakage is observed.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Significant motion- or blur-induced depth distortion; edges and scale cues are softened, reducing reliable depth cues from the scene.

ghosting.description: Overall smeared texture across surfaces, especially on walls and table, reducing surface fidelity.

over_blur.description: Strong blur across most regions, obscuring fine details and texture variation.

texture_inconsistency.description: Inconsistent texture sharpness between surfaces (e.g., wall vs. table) due to uneven rendering or post-processing.

image_details.summary: The rendering has plausible layout and object arrangement, but severe blur and texture smearing degrade geometric clarity and depth cues. Minor geometric structure is intact, but overall realism as a real-world scene is compromised by perceptual artifacts and inconsistent texturing.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Large wall panel and ceiling surfaces appear unnaturally warped and stretched, suggesting distorted geometry.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges around furniture and cabinetry do not align cleanly with adjacent surfaces; noticeable edge mismatches.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Perspective cues and depth relations appear inconsistent (objects overlap oddly, depth cues flattened in places).

ghosting.description: Faint ghost-like duplicates on some surfaces, especially near high-contrast areas.

floating_artifacts.description: Small detached texture patches appear to float above surfaces in certain regions.

over_blur.description: Regions lack sharp detail due to excessive blur, reducing perceived texture fidelity.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows a plausible room layout but suffers from notable geometric distortions and texture artifacts that reduce realism. Structural cues (edges, depth) are inconsistently maintained, and surface textures lack sharpness, resulting in a scene that is recognizable but not convincingly photorealistic.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Wall panel and painting appear slightly wavy and stretched, not perfectly flat.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges of furniture and cabinetry look slightly offset and not crisply aligned with room geometry.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Foreground objects and distant wall plane show minor perspective inconsistency, reducing depth accuracy.

ghosting.description: Subtle ghost-like edges around objects due to overlapping splats.

floating_artifacts.description: Sagging strands and stray filaments around scaffolding appear detached from surfaces.

over_blur.description: General scene looks softened; fine details (fabric, wood grain) are blurred.

texture_inconsistency.description: Surface textures vary irregularly (some patches too smooth, others overly detailed) for a single material.

image_details.summary: The render captures the scene layout and major components, but geometric distortions (warped walls, misaligned edges, depth inconsistencies) and noticeable texture artifacts (ghosting, floating strands, over-blur) reduce realism. Overall still recognizable as a 3D reconstruction, but imperfections prevent it from closely matching a real photograph.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Walls and surfaces show pronounced curvature and bending, especially on the left wall and near the back panel.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges along furniture and wall panels do not align cleanly; some gaps and misregistrations are visible.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues and perspective are inconsistent (ceiling/floor interaction and chair alignment) producing a flat/warped sense of depth.

ghosting.description: Subtle ghosting around high-contrast regions (red artwork) and near edges.

over_blur.description: Regions appear overly blurred, reducing fine texture fidelity (chairs, wall panel).

texture_inconsistency.description: Texture quality varies across surfaces; some areas look smeared while others are sharp.

image_details.summary: The render shows a recognizable room layout but with noticeable geometric and texture inconsistencies. Curved and warped walls, misaligned edges, depth compression, and several texture artifacts (ghosting, over-blur, inconsistent texture) reduce realism. Overall, it resembles a plausible scene but with non-negligible reconstruction errors that veer toward a mid-range quality rather than photorealistic accuracy.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Wall surfaces and shelving appear distorted with irregular, wavering contours, not corresponding to real geometry.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges along furniture and shelves do not align cleanly; lines appear skewed and inconsistent with room corners.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues and perspective seem inconsistent (e.g., furniture and wall depth do not consistently scale or converge).

ghosting.description: Fine line artifacts over surfaces, especially walls and glass-like structures, resembling ghosting.

over_blur.description: Some regions appear excessively smeared, reducing surface detail (e.g., upholstery and leaves).

texture_inconsistency.description: Inconsistent texture granularity; some areas look overly smooth while others are highly detailed with noise.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows a scene that roughly resembles the intended interior but suffers from notable geometric distortions and depth inconsistencies. Textures exhibit artifacts, ghosting, and uneven sharpness, leading to an overall perception of a plausible scene only at a rough level. Minor to moderate reconstruction errors dominate, making it clearly distinguishable from a real photograph.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Left dark wall appears strongly curved and irregular rather than flat, indicating warped geometry.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges between wall panels and furniture show slight misalignment and non-joinable seams.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues and perspective appear inconsistent (shelving and furniture do not align properly with the room).

floating_artifacts.description: Numerous thin strands and lines float around shelves, indicating occlusion or depth inconsistencies.

over_blur.description: Overall scene exhibits excessive blur in some surfaces, reducing texture sharpness.

texture_inconsistency.description: Texture quality varies abruptly across surfaces (wall vs. furniture vs. decor) with mismatched detail levels.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows notable geometric distortions (warped walls, misaligned edges, depth inconsistencies) and inconsistent textures. Visual coherence is compromised by floating artifacts and over-blurred surfaces, resulting in only moderate realism for a 3D reconstruction of an interior.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Large, irregular warping evident on the left wall and floor transition, giving a non-planar surface rather than real geometry.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges and seams do not align coherently between surfaces, especially near the boundary between the dark wall and lighter area on the right.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues are inconsistent; perspective seems distorted with skewed foreshortening and objects that do not recede realistically.

ghosting.description: Subtle ghosting around high-contrast edges, particularly near wall textures.

over_blur.description: Regions appear blurred relative to scene details, reducing texture sharpness.

texture_inconsistency.description: Texture quality varies abruptly between regions, with mismatched granularity and lighting.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows notable geometric and textural inconsistencies typical of aggressive 3DGS/NeRF-style reconstructions. Warped walls, misaligned edges, depth distortions, and uneven texture quality indicate unreliability for accurate real-world reconstruction without further refinement.

misaligned_edges.description: Visible seam and misalignment near the right boundary where the dark wall meets the lighter area.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Strong perspective distortion and abrupt boundary transitions, inconsistent depth cues across the scene.

over_blur.description: General softness on the textured wall, reducing fine detail.

texture_inconsistency.description: Texture quality varies between wall regions and boundary area; abrupt changes in detail level.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows a noisy, highly textured wall with significant depth and boundary inconsistencies. There are misaligned edges and depth cues that do not align with a coherent real-world geometry, along with overall blur and texture inconsistency that reduce realism. Minor geometry appears intact, but the scene lacks reliable multi-surface coherence and sharp texture fidelity necessary for a high-quality reconstruction.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Weak depth cues and inconsistent perspective across the dense dark surface; difficulty resolving foreground vs background due to uniform texture.

floating_artifacts.description: A bright circular overlay (white ring) obscures part of the texture, which looks inserted rather than part of the scene.

texture_inconsistency.description: Highly variable micro-geometry within the surface (dense hair-like strands) creates inconsistent shading and roughness, reducing photorealism.

image_details.summary: The rendering has a very noisy, densely patterned surface that challenges depth interpretation, leading to weak depth cues and inconsistent shading. There is a prominent synthetic overlay (white ring) that disrupts realism. Overall geometry is plausible but the texture coherence and depth perception are compromised, resulting in a below-average realism score for a real-world scene reconstruction.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Partial depth cue inconsistency; background strands and wall transition suggestOK depth but some portions lack coherent perspective cues.

texture_inconsistency.description: Inhomogeneous hair-like texture density and shading across the mass; abrupt tonal shifts near the left wall region.

image_details.summary: The render shows a dense, hair-like structure with a near-uniform mass on the right and a beige left wall. Overall geometry is plausible but depth and shading cues are inconsistent, leading to a noticeable sense of depth ambiguity. Texture is dense but exhibits local inconsistencies in density and tone. Minor reconstruction artifacts affect overall realism but do not completely break the scene structure.

vlm_analysis.summary: The rendering shows a plausible interior layout with reasonable room-scale cues, but suffers from notable geometric distortions (warped walls, misaligned edges) and depth inconsistencies. Textures are soft with ghosting and inconsistency across surfaces, indicating weaker 3DGS texture fidelity. Overall realism is moderate; it could be mistaken for a reconstruction with artifacts rather than a true photograph.
